segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is at the sink, towel in hand, working on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, filling the basin completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the water's cascading over the edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms quickly on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy balances on a stool by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are uneven, tilting back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below, arm extended toward him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating quietly, away from the woman's view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden path lined with plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in the daytime light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
